text: Ndithudi Karuni, mosakayika, adali wa ku mtundu wa Mose. Koma iye amawanyoza iwo chifukwa Ife tidamupatsa nkhokwe za chuma zimene ndithudi makiyi ake samatheka kunyamulidwa ndi anthu angapo a mphamvu. Anthu ake adati kwa iye, “Usadzikundikire chifukwa Mulungu sakonda anthu odzikundikira chifukwa cha chuma.”
